descr: "This resource allows for the definition of some activity to be performed, independent of a particular patient, practitioner, or other performance context."

fields.name: resourceType
fields.descr: "This is a ActivityDefinition resource"

fields.name: url
fields.descr: "An absolute URI that is used to identify this activity definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this activity definition is (or will be) published. The URL SHOULD include the major version of the activity definition. For more information see [Technical and Business Versions](resource.html#versions)."

fields.name: _url
fields.descr: "Extensions for url"

fields.name: identifier
fields.descr: "A formal identifier that is used to identify this activity definition when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance."

fields.name: version
fields.descr: "The identifier that is used to identify this version of the activity definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the activity definition author and is not expected to be globally unique. For example, it might be a timestamp (e.g. yyyymmdd) if a managed version is not available. There is also no expectation that versions can be placed in a lexicographical sequence. To provide a version consistent with the Decision Support Service specification, use the format Major.Minor.Revision (e.g. 1.0.0). For more information on versioning knowledge assets, refer to the Decision Support Service specification. Note that a version is required for non-experimental active assets."

fields.name: _version
fields.descr: "Extensions for version"

fields.name: name
fields.descr: "A natural language name identifying the activity definition. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation."

fields.name: _name
fields.descr: "Extensions for name"

fields.name: title
fields.descr: "A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the activity definition."

fields.name: _title
fields.descr: "Extensions for title"

fields.name: status
fields.descr: "The status of this activity definition. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content."

fields.name: _status
fields.descr: "Extensions for status"

fields.name: experimental
fields.descr: "A boolean value to indicate that this activity definition is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage."

fields.name: _experimental
fields.descr: "Extensions for experimental"

fields.name: date
fields.descr: "The date  (and optionally time) when the activity definition was published. The date must change if and when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the activity definition changes."

fields.name: _date
fields.descr: "Extensions for date"

fields.name: publisher
fields.descr: "The name of the individual or organization that published the activity definition."

fields.name: _publisher
fields.descr: "Extensions for publisher"

fields.name: description
fields.descr: "A free text natural language description of the activity definition from a consumer's perspective."

fields.name: _description
fields.descr: "Extensions for description"

fields.name: purpose
fields.descr: "Explaination of why this activity definition is needed and why it has been designed as it has."

fields.name: _purpose
fields.descr: "Extensions for purpose"

fields.name: usage
fields.descr: "A detailed description of how the asset is used from a clinical perspective."

fields.name: _usage
fields.descr: "Extensions for usage"

fields.name: approvalDate
fields.descr: "The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage."

fields.name: _approvalDate
fields.descr: "Extensions for approvalDate"

fields.name: lastReviewDate
fields.descr: "The date on which the resource content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after approval, but doesn't change the original approval date."

fields.name: _lastReviewDate
fields.descr: "Extensions for lastReviewDate"

fields.name: effectivePeriod
fields.descr: "The period during which the activity definition content was or is planned to be in active use."

fields.name: useContext
fields.descr: "The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate activity definition instances."

fields.name: jurisdiction
fields.descr: "A legal or geographic region in which the activity definition is intended to be used."

fields.name: topic
fields.descr: "Descriptive topics related to the content of the activity. Topics provide a high-level categorization of the activity that can be useful for filtering and searching."

fields.name: contributor
fields.descr: "A contributor to the content of the asset, including authors, editors, reviewers, and endorsers."

fields.name: contact
fields.descr: "Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher."

fields.name: copyright
fields.descr: "A copyright statement relating to the activity definition and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the activity definition."

fields.name: _copyright
fields.descr: "Extensions for copyright"

fields.name: relatedArtifact
fields.descr: "Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references."

fields.name: library
fields.descr: "A reference to a Library resource containing any formal logic used by the asset."

fields.name: kind
fields.descr: "A description of the kind of resource the activity definition is representing. For example, a MedicationRequest, a ProcedureRequest, or a CommunicationRequest. Typically, but not always, this is a Request resource."

fields.name: _kind
fields.descr: "Extensions for kind"

fields.name: code
fields.descr: "Detailed description of the type of activity; e.g. What lab test, what procedure, what kind of encounter."

fields.name: timingTiming
fields.descr: "The period, timing or frequency upon which the described activity is to occur."

fields.name: timingDateTime
fields.descr: "The period, timing or frequency upon which the described activity is to occur."

fields.name: _timingDateTime
fields.descr: "Extensions for timingDateTime"

fields.name: timingPeriod
fields.descr: "The period, timing or frequency upon which the described activity is to occur."

fields.name: timingRange
fields.descr: "The period, timing or frequency upon which the described activity is to occur."

fields.name: location
fields.descr: "Identifies the facility where the activity will occur; e.g. home, hospital, specific clinic, etc."

fields.name: participant
fields.descr: "Indicates who should participate in performing the action described."

fields.name: productReference
fields.descr: "Identifies the food, drug or other product being consumed or supplied in the activity."

fields.name: productCodeableConcept
fields.descr: "Identifies the food, drug or other product being consumed or supplied in the activity."

fields.name: quantity
fields.descr: "Identifies the quantity expected to be consumed at once (per dose, per meal, etc.)."

fields.name: dosage
fields.descr: "Provides detailed dosage instructions in the same way that they are described for MedicationRequest resources."

fields.name: bodySite
fields.descr: "Indicates the sites on the subject's body where the procedure should be performed (I.e. the target sites)."

fields.name: transform
fields.descr: "A reference to a StructureMap resource that defines a transform that can be executed to produce the intent resource using the ActivityDefinition instance as the input."

fields.name: dynamicValue
fields.descr: "Dynamic values that will be evaluated to produce values for elements of the resulting resource. For example, if the dosage of a medication must be computed based on the patient's weight, a dynamic value would be used to specify an expression that calculated the weight, and the path on the intent resource that would contain the result."

fields.name: text
fields.descr:
"A human-readable narrative that contains a summary of the resource, and may be used to represent the content of the resource to a human. The narrative need not encode all the structured data, but is required to contain sufficient detail to make it \"clinically safe\" for a human to just read the narrative. Resource definitions may define what content should be represented in the narrative to ensure clinical safety."
 derived from DomainResource

fields.name: contained
fields.descr:
"These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope."
 derived from DomainResource

fields.name: extension
fields.descr:
"May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource. In order to make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension."
 derived from DomainResource

fields.name: modifierExtension
fields.descr:
"May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource, and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. In order to make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions."
 derived from DomainResource

fields.name: id
fields.descr:
"The logical id of the resource, as used in the URL for the resource. Once assigned, this value never changes."
 derived from Resource
 derived from DomainResource

fields.descr:
"Extensions for id"

fields.name: meta
fields.descr:
"The metadata about the resource. This is content that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content may not always be associated with version changes to the resource."
 derived from Resource
 derived from DomainResource

fields.name: implicitRules
fields.descr:
"A reference to a set of rules that were followed when the resource was constructed, and which must be understood when processing the content."
 derived from Resource
 derived from DomainResource

 derived from Resource
 derived from DomainResource

fields.name: language
fields.descr:
"The base language in which the resource is written."
